description: Associates a self-service action with a provisioning artifact.

parameters.name: ProductId
parameters.description: The product identifier. For example, prod-abcdzk7xy33qa.

parameters.name: ProvisioningArtifactId
parameters.description: The identifier of the provisioning artifact. For example, pa-4abcdjnxjj6ne.

parameters.name: ServiceActionId
parameters.description: The self-service action identifier. For example, act-fs7abcd89wxyz.

parameters.name: AcceptLanguage
parameters.description: The language code. jp - Japanese zh - Chinese.

parameters.name: IdempotencyToken
parameters.description: A unique identifier that you provide to ensure idempotency. If multiple requests from the same Amazon Web Services account use the same idempotency token, the same response is returned for each repeated request. This field is autopopulated if not provided.
